com.wizzer.mle.runtime.core

Class MleMediaRefConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.wizzer.mle.runtime.core.MleMediaRefConverter

  • public class MleMediaRefConverter
extends java.lang.Object
    MleMediaRefConverter is a class that determines a local representation from a media reference, which may be a file, URL, or some other type of identifier.

    This is the base class for all Magic Lantern media reference converters. It treats the reference as a local file name.

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Mark S. Millard
    See Also:
    MleMediaRef

    • Method Detail

      • setReference

        public void setReference(java.lang.Object reference)
        Set the media reference for this converter.
        Parameters:
        reference - The media reference to convert.

      • getReference

        public java.lang.Object getReference()
        Get the media reference for this converter.
        Returns:
        The media reference is returned.

      • getFilename

        public java.lang.String getFilename()
                             throws MleRuntimeException
        Treat the media reference as a filename.
        Returns:
        The media reference is returned as a String. null will be returned if no reference has ever been set for conversion.
        Throws:
        MleRuntimeException - This exception will be thrown if an error occurs while attempting to get the filename.
        See Also:
        setReference(Object)

      • conversionComplete

        public boolean conversionComplete()
                           throws MleRuntimeException
        Determine if the conversion is complete.
        Returns:
        true will be returned if the conversion has completed successfully. Otherwise, false will be returned.
        Throws:
        MleRuntimeException - This exception is thrown if an error occured while converting the media reference data.

      • dispose

        public void dispose()
        Dispose of converter resources.
